Getting Started¶

1. Launching the software:¶

Open a new terminal and launch gmg using the command gmg.py or the alias you may have setup.

2. Creating a new model:¶

Navigate to the file menu and select new model…

Here you input: * 1. The new model dimensions in km * 2. The spacing at which potential fields are to be calculated.

Note

Setting this spacing as a relatively coarse value to begin with will ensure the program runs smoothly, this can later be refined for detailed analysis once a first model is complete.

3. Get Modelling!¶

You can now add layers and edit the model.

See the Tools instructions for details on how to do this.
